article_text: As you might expect from somebody who has his own race to run in 2016, Republican U.S. Sen. Richard Burr isn’t about to endorse a GOP presidential candidate, but he has candid assessments of the party’s field of potential contenders.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Richard Burr, Rand Paul, William Barber, Jim Puckett, Jason Saine, Paul Luebke
article_metadata.description: As you might expect from somebody who has his own race to run in 2016, Republican U.S. Sen. Richard Burr isn’t about to endorse a GOP presidential candidate, but he has candid assessments of the party’s field of potential contenders.
article_metadata.title: Burr tips his hand on 2016 hopefuls | The Charlotte Observer
